segments.text: I am really exhausted , you know , I have been working without the weekend for two weeks . My boss always asks us to work overtime .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does your boss pay you for the over-time work ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . But he provides free meals and sometimes gives us some small gifts . Many of us get very tired of this , and we'd rather have weekends than stay in the office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He should know that this is against the Labor Law in our country . Legally , employees should get double pay if asked to do extra work during the weekend or on holidays .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We all know about that , but we have no choice . The chairman of the trade union says he is going to negotiate with the management .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I suggest that you go to the lawyers ' office to get some help .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a good idea . I think we will soon come to a solution to the problem .
segments.speaker: S1
